originalText.text: Horrible customer service. As I ordered a dress that states in stock and the shipping time is still outrageous. Unprofessional, email after email. No response in weeks. no dress. Would give negative stars for the way customers are treated. Refunds aren‚Äôt allowed for this horrible service insane.

originalText.text: I absolutely loved my baby shower dress. I ordered my dress last minute and it arrived right on time and im not even a local customer! When i got my dress the quality was amazing and 100% worth the price it was perfect!

originalText.text: My experience with Steph was amazing. I needed a birthday dress by a certain time, and was on vacation when she dropped her new designs. I messaged her and received a response within hours. She was very sweet and processed my order. Even when I wrote her again for an update she responded no problem. I got my dress today and I loveeeee it üíï

originalText.text: Nice dresses, nice girl. Horrible service. I wrote her a few weeks before the shower to do a simple short custom dress... super simple dress and she asked me to get measurements giving me her word on being able to do the dress for me. Extremely hard to reach her and get things going, tells me to send pictures of myself and that she will forward color options from what she has. Then literally 6 days before the shower writes me ‚Äúhey‚Äù then I ask her is this going to happen?? Because she has not yet shown me colors nor asked for a deposit.... After I went out to get measurements at that. Waste of time out of my life! Extremely upsetting! So if you‚Äôre going to ask for a custom dress I suggest months before since she clearly doesn‚Äôt have a efficient functioning system to take in many orders nor knows how to handle the request properly when it‚Äôs done at a time she cannot handle. So I suggest ordering online the dresses she has made for less stress. Super unfortunate to see! But at least she has cute pieces...
